short_summary: REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS TO PROVIDE Long Sleeve Duty Sirts}
description: Requirement for RCMP is for 60,000 Long Sleeve Duty Shirts and 60,000 Short Sleeve Duty Shir.
full_summary:
# M7594-245352 NPP Duty Shirts Tender Announcement
## Publication details
| Field Name         | Value                                  |
| :------------------ | :------------------------------------ |
| Solicitation Number | WS4541125893                           |
| Publication Date    | 2024-04-16                              |
| Closing Date        | 2024-04-30 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)     |

## Brief Description of the Tender
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to procure a quantity of long-sleeve and short-sleeve duty shirts in accordance with RCMP Specification No. G.S. 1045-391, dated January 31, 2024. The procurement is limited to Canadian goods, in accordance with Article 503.4(b) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

## Key Dates

*   Contract anticipated start date: None
*   Contract anticipated end date: 2025-07-18
*   Tender closing date: 2024-04-30 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Procurement Details

*   The proposed procurement will occur in two phases:
    *   Phase 1: Expression of Interest
    *   Phase 2: Solicitation with specific details of the requirement
*   Interested bidders must submit a Submission of Interest form and a Non-Disclosure and Confidentiality of Information Agreement (NDCIA)
*   Canada reserves the right to modify or terminate the procurement at its discretion

## Tender Address
This procurement is being managed by:
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
For any inquiries related to this procurement, please contact:
*   Name: Laura Williams
*   Email: [laura.williams@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:laura.williams@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Organization: PSPC/SPAC

## Additional Information
*   The notice URL for this tender is https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19419752?extsite=MTk0MTk3NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*   This procurement may not result in any subsequent procurement processes

**end**  -
